attributes.action: Make it a criminal offence to intentionally disconnect internet without reason
attributes.additional_details: We all need the internet these days, many of us for our businesses. During the pandemic many more of us are working from home and loss of connection can be detrimental to business and cause huge stress.
attributes.background: When installing internet connections for properties, unscrupulous engineers sometimes disconnect an existing property and use the connection for a new customer leaving the existing customer with no internet connection. This is a known issue in the industry and must be stopped.

rejection.details: We think the action you describe would already be prohibited under existing laws. If you believe you have been the victim of such an action, you could complain to your internet provider or to police.
